title: Gerhard Schröder - Wikipedia
snippet: In February 2004, Schröder resigned as chairman of the SPD amid growing criticism from across his own party of his reform agenda; Franz Müntefering succeeded him as chairman. title: Putin ally Gerhard Schröder heads for reconciliation with German social democrats – POLITICO
snippet: Matthias Miersch, who is in charge of managing the SPD’s election campaign, told German magazine Stern “yes” when asked if there should be room for Schröder in the SPD, signaling an easing of relations with the former top politician who last year survived an attempt to expel him from the party.

title: Gerhard Schröder – DW
snippet: Schröder's move to the Golden State Warriors shows what constraints the world champion is subject to in the NBA.

title: Gerhard Fritz Kurt Schröder | InterAction Council
snippet: Gerhard Schröder is the first of a new generation of vibrant German leaders. He took on the newly reunited Germany and boldly ushered the world’s third largest economy into the 21st century.
